problems.title: Check if Three Numbers are in Increasing or Decreasing Order
problems.description:
Given three numbers, check if they are in:
- Increasing order (a < b < c): Print "Increasing"
- Decreasing order (a > b > c): Print "Decreasing"
- Neither: Print "Neither"

Input Format:
Three integers separated by space.

Output Format:
Print "Increasing", "Decreasing", or "Neither".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
1 2 3

Sample Output
Increasing

Sample Input
3 2 1

Sample Output
Decreasing

Sample Input
1 3 2

Sample Output
Neither

Explanation:
Use nested conditions to check if numbers are strictly increasing or decreasing.
hintsList: Check if a < b and b < c (Increasing), or a > b and b > c (Decreasing), else Neither.
